title: (36867) - 12 Lugar Searas
description: Eroski car park. Quiet zone.

title: (36860) Ponteareas - 1 Rúa Doctor Fernández Vega
description: Nice large laundry room with parking in front. There are 2 Washers and 4 Dryers. Nearby there are Bars for waiting.

title: (36866) Ponteareas - 56 Barranco Freixa
description: Freixa river beach. Very busy in the summer during the day, very quiet at night. In summer there are beach bars during the day and even in recent years lifeguards on the river beach. You can park without problems all year round. Please respect the environment and do not litter, water or camp. A fountain crosses the dam, as well as a recreation area and sports fields. Also a very pleasant riverside path to walk. The town is 2 km away. There is a supermarket just over 1 km away.

title: (36866) Ponteareas - 29 Barranco Freixa
description: Quiet place at night next to the Tea river, 2 km from the city on foot. There is a several kilometer river path, well marked and signposted, with plenty of shade and very pleasant to walk. There are stone tables and public sports fields right next to it.

title: (36895) - 17 Rua Chans
description: Private enclosed level property. Completely gated so pets cannot escape the property.

title: (36448) As Neves - Unnamed Road
description: Along a path, under the poplars with a small spring, start of walks. no passage at night, flat. good narrow climb to access it for 200m.

title: (36890) Mondariz-Balneario - 14 Avenida Enrique Peinador Vela
description: Small parking lot by the river, with sports equipment, perfect for picnics, overnight stay possible, no service.

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - CP-9002
description: Cordeiro river beach. Quite shady place and lots of tables. Very flat and away from main roads, so I don't think it will get too crowded

title: (36448) Nieves - Unnamed Road
description: Easily accessible by road for 90% of the journey, the end requires a little more commitment (easy in a short 4x4 van and cc 4x4) not possible in a cc non 4x4 in my opinion of course! We are in cc 4x4 of 7m. Not a sound not a waste and no one on weekdays!!! The Chapel is closed

title: (36448) As Neves - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome location above the clouds, quiet and amazing view.

title: (36875) Mondariz - 5 PO-252
description: Service area for motorhomes. It has a black and gray water drain, full of clean water and containers. Large parking. Area next to the fluvial beach "Fuente del Val", Mondariz (next to the spa Mondariz). On the river beach you will find a basketball court, a five-a-side football pitch, tennis courts, barbecues and a bar. Village Mondariz and Mondariz Spa within 2 km.

title: (36418) A Arrotea - Unnamed Road
description: Faro Budiño, parking / picnic area that gives access to the climbing school of the same name. Quiet and green place. On weekends something more noisy. Very steep access road in the first section, then smooths out.

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 21 Rúa Pontevedra
description: Quiet area with some trees. You can spend the night and the service area is about 400 meters. It is about 50 meters from the center with all the shops around.

title: (36418) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Atios forest park, has enough tables to eat, a large fireplace for grill and parking area. It has water. We spent half a day there and a very quiet place. We would repeat without a doubt, highly recommended.

title: (36400) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Two very quiet areas to spend the night both during the day and at night the area below where the large esplanade is at night can be more busy, we stayed in the upper one and all night without noise, a fairly safe place

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 4 Rúa Mártires de Sobredo
title_short: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 4 Rúa Mártires de Sobredo
description: Quiet parking.

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 26 Rúa Rafael Tilve Adrio
title_short: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 26 Rúa Rafael Tilve Adrio
description: Self-service laundry with ample dirt parking to park while you do your laundry

title: (36415) - Estrada Porriño Redondela
description: Gas station. Draining gray and black water is free (ideal for refueling)

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - PO-510
description: Area for motorhome and van. Open since April 2015 water and emptying. The site is not ideal for sleeping because it is surrounded by roads, but is 5 minutes walk from the center and is the point of the Landres River road that is adjacent to it.

title: (36415) Mos -
description: Public parking gravel, flat and large. near the museum. we spent the night visiting a peregrino . the bar is very good, O Alpendre cheap prices. many motorhomes enter, but I think 10 would be a number that does not bother

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 23 Bajo, Rúa Castelao
title_short: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 23 Bajo, Rúa Castelao
description: Acolada Self-Service Laundry. Easy parking. There is a water fountain right on the next corner.

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 10 Rúa Castelao
description: Laundry, it is the cheapest in the area.

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 33 Rúa de Galicia
title_short: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 33 Rúa de Galicia
description: Salvatierra de Miño, has a walk along the banks of the Miño River, areas to visit such as its walls, and has free parking for motorhomes

title: (36457) - 38 Lugar Pedrafurada
description: Parking next to the Hot Water Municipal Baths of Salvaterra de Miño.

name: Área de servizo de Caravanas
title: (36450) Área de servizo de Caravanas
description: Quiet area on the banks of the Minho River and close to Canuda Park. Parking is only 2 hours there, and overnight stays are no longer allowed.

title: (36400) O Porriño - Calle Tras dos Fornos
title_short: (36400) O Porriño - Calle Tras dos Fornos
description:
Porriño does not have much to visit. Large plot of land, 5 minutes from downtown walking.
crossing the train track through the tunnel there is a path along the Louro river. Many places to eat, we ate at Bar Celtiña less than 500m. On Tuesday you have to be careful there is a street market and the townspeople fill the parking lot (it's morning).
On July 11 and the last two of September are local parties and this parking is used to put the odds and ends.

title: (36450) Salvatierra de Miño - Paseo Fluvial
description: Parking at the foot of the river, it is very quiet at night. During the day it is more traveled by having a playground. Perfect to go with bicycles or kayaks, there is a bike path that passes through the parking lot and follows everything along the river side.

title: (36400) Porriño - 16 Avenida Buenos Aires
description: New self-service laundry and dryer. Wifi with a good connection.

title: (4950) Monção - 10 Avenida das Caldas
description: Parking of the public garden. Playground for the little ones. Advised by the tourist office. River at 50m. Shady. We are Monday and everything is calm. Opportunity to have water from the caretaker at the pool.

title: (4950-454) Monção - Av Afonso III
description: Ground parking shared with cars. We stayed several times very quiet. two minutes from downtown.

title: (36475) - 52 Lugar Vacaria
description: Ample parking at the As Fornas Cultural Center. Super friendly owner, homemade food, spectacular treatment. Not being an area here, man offers you waters. We have spent two super quiet nights, free parking, hiking trails from the parking lot, soccer field, playground, radio controlled car track, highly recommended place.

title: (36447) Sancharredonda - Unnamed Road
description: Asphalt and earth esplanade next to a hermitage with a small cemetery and accompanied by some picnic tables. There are shadows and it's quiet. We have not spent the night we have only stopped to eat.

title: (4950) Monção - 1 N202
description: Car park

title: (4950) Monção - 1 Rua Monsenhor Avelino Gonçalves
description: Ideal for visiting, no service, at the foot of the fortress. Huge semi-shaded car park close to the historic center

title: (4950) Monção - 8 EM1097-1
description: Huge parking lot, no prohibition signs. Quiet nights! There is a water tap, but without thread. Highly recommended! Please note: every Thursday there is a market in this parking lot. So DO NOT park between Thursday 05:00 am and Thursday 18:00 pm

title: (4950) Cortez - Avenida da Boavista Monção
description: 3 parking spaces in the Continente supermarket car park reserved for AC

title: (4950) Monção - 178 Rua do Rio Minho
description: Quiet place near the river where there is a path that goes through orchards

title: (36410) O Porriño - 2 Rúa B
description: Area with easy parking. It has a self-service laundry with special washing machines for washing pets, a supermarket, a bakery with very good quality products, a couple of cafeterias and a small playground

title: (36400) O Porriño - 2 Rua Paralela 1
description: Service area with showers for a fee. The girl who took care of me was very friendly and helpful.

title: (4950) Monção - 152 EN202
description: drinking water fountain. Water is controlled and suitable for consumption. Access and exit excellent. No faucet or thread. Therefore only with bucket and watering can.

title: (36440) As Neves - 8 Praza San Agustín
description: Night and area services. Drinking water and gray and black water drain free. 50 meters from the city center. Calm.

title: (36440) As Neves - 12 Estrada Circunvalación
description: Good and bright place to park and spend the night. The road is on the side, but cars hardly pass at night. There is a school next door .. Very quiet place.

title: (36415) Redondela - 25 chan das pipas
description: Picnic area near a bar. There are several good areas to park the motorhome. The place is quiet at night. There are different routes

title: (36815) Redondela - 3 Camino Igrexa de Vilar
description: Parking next to Igrexia de San Martino (and its cemetery), from where you can access the water path, and visit the ruins of a mill. Fairly flat site with room for several ACs.

title: (4950) Mazedo - Parking Igreja
description:
Huge and empty car park by the church, asphalted and inclined. Beautiful views on the foggy mountains in the morning. Quiet at night, church bells in the morning. Little shade, toilets and water behind the church. 

2km from Monçao, which was too noisy for us on a Friday night.

title: (4950-096) - EM1112-2
description: Lovelylittle restaurante by the road nice service good food

title: (4950) Lapela - Rua do Rio Minho
description: Nice place to spend a night or two. Right next to the Minho River and Torre de Lapela. This is a picnic area with tables, restrooms, barbecues and water nearby. Try not to reach the place through the village as the curves are short and could damage your motorhome. There is a road around the village which also leads to this picnic spot! In the village you will find a café and a supermarket.

title: (36446) As Neves - 24 Lugar Chandevide
description: Picnic area under the shade of Carballos, with a play area, barbecue, the possibility of sleeping and a bar nearby. Very calm

title: (36872) Covelo - 25 Estrada Maceira
description: Thanks to the town of Covelo for this facility, an area well located for mountain biking trails, near the river beach of Maceira. Village with a lot of life and municipal swimming pools.

title: (36318) Vigo - 183 Rúa da Becerreira
description: Quiet natural park throughout the day where you can rest safely, in summer it is cool because the trees give a lot of shade. It has no services but there is a gas station a few meters away with a cafeteria (closed on weekends) and bathrooms.

title: (36416) - 23 Avenida do Rebullón
description: Tameiga Park Parking. With picnic tables and barbecues, next to the Bembrive picnic area and a motorhome area that also has a toilet.

title: (36721) Os Baños - 74 Rúa Baños
description: Next to the river Miño in Caldelas. In summer there is a chiringuito open and at the end of August there are very popular festivals and it gets full of people. you have to be careful in winter with the rises in the river flow. beautiful views and possibility of routes and bathing

title: (36416) Tameiga - Avenida do Rebullón 23
description: ACCESS From the AP-9, take exit 159 if you are coming from Bayona, or 159-B and then the 8 Puxeiros if you are coming from Peinador, continue and once at the Alto de Puxeiros roundabout turn right west towards Rebullón and continue to As Center Pedriñas, where the area is located. If you are on the N-120, take exit 8 if coming from Vigo, or 9 if coming from Porriño, to the Alto de Puxeiros roundabout. COMMENTS Maximum stay of 72 hours. INTERESTING Privileged setting with swimming pool, cafeteria with daily menu, sports fields and barbecues. Forest park nearby. A petrol station is 2 km away. Bus stop for Vigo at 1km. All services in the urban area, about 400 m. Hiking routes, viewpoints towards Vigo and towards the Louriña Valley.

title: (36416) - s/n Avenida do Rebullón
description: Bembrive Forest Park. Area with tables, barbecues and children's play area. Views of the Cíes Islands. Very quiet place. Sandwich bar on site.

title: (36729) Os Baños - 37 Rúa Baños
description: At the end of a small road, we spent a single, hassle-free night near the Mino River.

title: (36313) O Pouso - Av. do Rebullón
description: Well-leveled dirt parking next to a recreational area with tables and barbecue. There is a bar, garbage cans and swings. There are streetlights where the tables are. The water fountains do not work as of August 25, 2023. A little noisy due to the highway that passes relatively nearby.

title: (36313) Vigo - Camiño Área do Lecer
description: Pouso forest park. area with tables, barbecues, fountain, playground, hiking trails and mountain biking. very calm.

title: (36812) Redondela - 81 N-555
description: It is a camper friendly restaurant. We already came here a year ago and they let us spend the night at their farm after dinner and the next day they very kindly refilled our water tank.

title: (36313) Vigo - 33A Rúa dos Chans
description: Nice picnic area, many tables and benches to choose from, sun or shade, and we will spend the night here

title: (36818) Redondela - 35 Estrada a Pazos de Borbén
title_short: (36818) Redondela - 35 Estrada a Pazos de Borbén
description: Free parking in the municipality of Redondela. Very calm and quiet, ideal to spend the night after having dinner in one of the "furanchos" in the area. Highly recommended in particular the one in O Tarrastal, 300 meters away.

title: (36710) O Porto de Bouzas - 1C Lugar Cotarel
title_short: (36710) O Porto de Bouzas - 1C Lugar Cotarel
description: Former asphalt sports field in the middle of nature. The new park is just below. Beautiful view with stream, pick nick table and barbecue a few meters away. A few houses scattered around.

name: Pazo Pondal
title: (36436) Pazo Pondal
description: Wine cellar with agriculture (13 ha). Production of Albariño wines 100/100.

title: (36310) Vigo - 234 Estrada da Igrexa
description: Parking area in Parque Forestal de Zamans, 10 minutes from Vigo.Bar and Restaurant of the Association of Zamans in the same parking. Water and soon emptied.

title: (36436) A Lavandeira - 24 Lugar Iglesia
description: Public parking next to the restaurant. Well paved and level. Quiet. The church bell gives something the can to mark hours.

title: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
title_short: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
description: Picnic area with toilets and drinking water. Next to the ecopista and river miño.

title: (36873) Covelo - PO-255
description: Glade on a forest road with a beautiful view of the surrounding mountains. From the PO-255 southbound on the forest road. In dry weather also suitable for vans.

title: (36873) - 37A Lugar Igrexa
description: Nice area to hang out, with a nearby chapel with incredible views that you can climb on foot. It has swings, fountain and garbage containers.

title: (36317) Vigo - Camiño Monte Vixiados
description: Vixiador forest park. wooded area with barbecues, stone tables and benches, children's play area, fountains and a bar next to it. hiking and mountain biking trails

title: (36715) Tui - 9 Rúa Loureiro
description: Beade Forest Park. tables, barbecues, fountains, playground for children, views of the estuary, bar-restaurant, hiking trails. Very calm

name: Aneli Sertuy
title: (36720) Aneli Sertuy
description: Gas station with free shower. Very nice staff. We took a shower and filled up the fuel afterwards (also cheap)

title: (36310) Vigo - 13 Camiño da Arrouba
description: Shaded flat parking, ideal for doing the zamans mill route, very quiet, we do not bother anyone ???

title: (36812) Redondela - 1 Camiño Condesa de Torrecedeira
description: Drinking water tap only to fill bottles

title: (36873) Covelo - 13B Lugar Castro
description: Very quiet place to spend the night and watch the stars on clear nights, with benches in the chapel and a fort right next to it.Ideal place to take a walk along the forest track that climbs towards the mountain, with wonderful views time up high.

title: (36313) Vigo - 339 Estrada de Bembrive
description: Parking to start a route

title: (36310) Vigo - 46 Estrada da Igrexa
description: Small siding next to the road and the river, where the Zamans Mills Route starts.

title: (36800) Redondela - N-550
description: Services for motorhomes at the Repsol de Redondela service station on the N-550 road towards Pontevedra or towards Vigo. There are services in both directions of traffic. They have a food store, baked bread, AdBlue and butane bottles.

title: (36712) Tui - 159 PO-3001
description: Nice little place in peace, just next door you can take the path that goes down for 100m and you are right at the edge of the stream.

title: (36214) Vigo - 41H Rúa Barreiro
description: Mixed municipal parking without restrictions, shaded during the day, all shops nearby.

title: (36720) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Earthen parking at the edge of the river. Some places overlooking the river. Trees to have shade.

title: (36693) Redondela - 38 Avenida Mendiño
description: Large parking area 10 minutes from the center on foot. Sandy soil and with some unevenness. Perfect to spend the day in Rondela.

title: (4950) - EM1120
description:
Nice place with a lot of space
next to the beach Praia do Sr do Rio 
cold shower, piknik tables and barbecues.
great calm place for people with childrens

name: Camping Maceira
title: (36873) Camping Maceira
description:
Camping Maceira. 
Enjoy your holidays with your family and friends in this 1st category mountain campsite located a few meters from the river beach of Maceira, a spectacular natural environment. Admire the banks of the Tea rivers and their tributaries, with their waterfalls and swimming pools, make the wonderful hiking and mountain biking routes suitable for all audiences.

title: (36712) Tui - A-55
description: Playground and picnic areas next to the parking area. On the outskirts of Tui. Water fountain. There is a taperia right in front. Ideal to go with children.

title: (36812) Redondela - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the night outside of the city, has tables to spend the day too. We only spend the night and no noise, we recommend it! (06/21/19)

title: (36873) - 2A Lugar Souto
description: Very nice river beach. Nearby, a specific public car park for her, from which it is reached by a very short path with wooden posts. Next to camping

title: (36887) - 1 Lugar Peña Francia
description: Church with little traffic, ideal for sleeping and has a small fountain with water

title: (36851) Bustelos - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful vantage point, accessible to the top with a small CP or 4x4. Can also spend the night here.

title: (36437) O Vieiro - 1 Lugar Iglesia
description: Church car park and, going up 200 meters further, the town square and a picnic area. Very good views. Quiet. The entrance from the main road is steep and narrow. Refrain beginners or explore earlier.

title: (36851) Fornelos de Montes - PO-255
description:
Parking in the middle of this fantastic nature and at the Mirador Chan de Correiro. A beautiful and peaceful spot from where you can start a trail through the mountains. The area is not flat, not tarmacked and just a simple spot. Picknicktables are just 50m away. Quiet through day and night. The road PO255 is curvy and partially not in a superb condition, narrow also and can be crossed by cows, sheeps and goats.
Keep it clean to respect this beautiful nature!

title: (36317) Vigo - 3F Subida á Madroa
description: Zoo parking lot, quiet with picnic tables, small kiosk café and beautiful viewpoint over the Ría de Vigo.

title: (36389) Gondomar - Unnamed Road
description: Highest point of Monte Galiñeiro. It is accessed by a gravel track, with only one lane. At the highest point you find a small flat parking area, where to spend the night, spectacular views. There are no services

title: (36812) Redondela - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and great views. Directions via dust roads.

title: (36414) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Old quarry with room for several vans. Access by dirt track. Perfect for visiting Monte Aloia Without services.

title: (36430) Arbo - PO-400
description: Night area with drinking water, black water and waste water. Near the bridge to cross for Portugal.

title: (36437) Arbo - 13 Lugar Lomba
description: Nice quiet picnic spot to stop to eat and rest. clean shading with a fountain and garbage cans. It is next to the road but little traffic.

title: (4930) - Unnamed Road
description: St Ovidio viewpoint

title: (36414) Os Cabreiros -
description: Spot in front of a big stone, which blockes the road to the quarry. Good view and nice area to hike. You can also explore the quarry. A lot of animal poo in this area and wild horses in the forests around you.

title: (36700) Tui - 22A Rúa Canónigo Valiño
description: Very quiet free parking 800 meters from tui cathedral, without services

title: (36712) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Monte Aloya, there is a bar there are WCs, there is no motorhome service.

title: (36700) Tuy - 1 O Rollo
description: Esplanade and wide and free streets. Useful when the municipal parking lot is too full to maneuver.

title: (36316) Gondomar - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with drinking water. peaceful place. There is a lot of parking (land) and it is quite flat for the night. On open days the views can be enjoyed beautiful views. There is a mountain refuge next to it.

title: (36205) Vigo - 14 Avenida de Emilio Martínez Garrido
title_short: (36205) Vigo - 14 Avenida de Emilio Martínez Garrido
description: Lacolada Martínez Garrido self-service laundry. It has 3 washing machines and 2 dryers, as well as a machine for changing banknotes to coins. Next to a square and cafeteria.

title: (36700) Tuy - 2A Prolongación Alcalde Casal Aboy
description: Solar used as parking, also close to the health center, there are two others closer, this seemed the quietest / safest and suitable for our trailer .

title: (36700) Tui - 34 Rúa O Pilar
description: LAUNDRY

title: (36206) Vigo - 217 Camino Gonderan
description: Gonderan Street. 100 meters down the pedestrian street is C. Comercial Travesía, (Carrefour). Ideal for spending the night on the weekend since there is a school during the week. Water source 150 meters, beaches 15 minutes, Path "Ruta del Agua" 200 meters. Bakeries, laundries, gas stations in the area.

title: (36700) Tui - 4 Rúa Ourense
description: Free parking, quiet and many places

title: (36320) Chapela - 60 Rúa San Telmo
description: Beautiful little parking lot near the sports centre with cafes restaurants play area, beach for swimming and separate beach especially for dogs very close. Free of charge and possible to stay overnight.

title: (36430) A Estación - 20 Rúa da Estación
description: I have parked one night in the shade under a tree. It was nice and flat. There is water to drink and you can bathe in the river. It is a very nice place for one night.

title: (36812) Redondela - 2 Camiño Praia de Rande
description: Picnic table area next to the estuary. Good parking. Narrow access only for vans.

title: (36873) Covelo - PO-255
description: Two wooden tables with panoramic views

name: Camping Cesantes
title: (36693) Camping Cesantes
description: Camping Cesantes

title: (36693) Redondela - 44 Paseo Da Praia
description: public parking right on the beach and the kitespot. Very good public toilets and showers on the beach. Camping forbidden. Small vehicles only

title: (36693) Pontevedra - 12 Camiño Campos da Ribeira
description: Large field. Even when the public car parks by the beach are crowded, there is plenty of room for dozens of motorhomes. In addition, it is possible to stay the night like most occupants of the parking. The parking has direct access to the beach and children's games. No service on site, but a shower and a toilet on the beach.

title: (36693) Redondela - 40 Paseo da Praia
description: Parking lot on the roadside, no problem with our 6.5 meter long van. Very clean public toilet and beach showers. Picnic benches are also available. We stood here for one night, very quiet and no problems.

title: (36207) Vigo - Avd de la Marina Española 1
title_short: (36207) Vigo - Avd de la Marina Española 1
description: Parking for motorhomes, (maximum 24 hours) Winter hours from 9:30 a.m. to 8 p.m. Summer hours from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. Water service (ONLY FOR CUSTOMERS). 2.5km from the center. Bus stop 50m away, and health center, pharmacy and 5 different supermarkets 200m away. Entrance to the highway and small beach 300 m away. Entry can be personal or assisted (call to enter). Check-in when entering, check-out when leaving. THERE ARE NO BATHROOMS.

title: (36693) Redondela - 33 Paseo da Praia
description: Public parking next to the beach, very correct toilets and showers on the beach. Very calm.

title: (36207) Vigo - 131 Rúa Campana
description: Self-service laundry from 8:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. 365 days a year. Avenida Sanjurjo Badía num. 181

title: (36691) Sotomayor - EP-2908
description: Free ground parking ideal for visiting the castle.

title: (4950) Monção - 63 EM1104
description: Ample parking of the bar "cafe bar da escola" where we are well received with our vehicles and we can spend the night quietly, lovely people, do not charge for parking and cater to the traveler in a pleasant way

name: Camping Cañiza
title: (36888) Camping Cañiza
description: Camping Caniza

title: (36693) Cesantes - 18 Paseo da Praia
description: Dead-end well lit road along back of the beach.  Level parking spots.  We just fit our 6m van.  Two or three bars along the beach and a great bakery just up the hill.  Super views across the ria.  Can be windy and is a popular spot for kite surf.  Awesome playground.

name: Área de autocaravanas Tui
title: (36700) Área de autocaravanas Tui
description: Motorhome parking for a maximum of 3 vehicles. Water available on site, disposal possible via a hole in the ground. It is approx. 500 meters to the village. It is a place of pilgrimage with corresponding prices, but worth seeing. Access maximum 3.5 tons.

title: (4930) Monte do Faro - 6 N101-1
description: Site next to picnic area. There is a fountain near the lookout. We didn't stay overnight, we just parked to see the views. It seems calm.

title: (36204) Vigo - 3 Travesía Couto San Honorato 1
description: parking

title: (36691) Soutomaior - EP- 2908
description: There is a car park for any vehicle, the other dirt park is further away and difficult to enter, you could get the car buried in the gravel.

title: (36700) Tui - 15 Rúa Barca
description:
Several areas with parking and views of the river Miño.
Good place to spend the day with the family, children's area, walks along the river.
Very quiet to sleep.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 9 N-554
description: View of the oyster banquette of Vigo. Sandy beach for swimming. The street nearby is audible with a little noise! Stay overnight without problems! Slight slope unless you right on the front.

title: (36810) Redondela - 24 Camiño o Castro
description: It is a paved car park at the foot of Monte da Peneda, a lookout mountain with a small chapel where you can contemplate the Ría de Vigo and San Simón cove. The uphill road is paved but narrow.

title: (36142) Santradán - N-554
description: Ground parking attached to the road with sea views. Some unevenness and noise from cars but it can be a good option to stop for lunch or go to spend the day at the beach that is a few meters away.

title: (36880) A Cañiza - 25 Estrada Logroño-Vigo
description: Own laundry

title: (36810) Redondela - 13 Camiño de Saramagoso
description: Near some petroglyphs and with the possibility of making routes through the mountain.

title: (36207) Vigo - 16 Avenida Guixar
description: Ideal parking to leave the AC and visit the center of Vigo. Close to the train track but at night they do not circulate. Old town at 2 kms.

lugar muy tranquilo donde pasar la noche cercano al casco urbano

title: (36207) Vigo - 39 Travesía Espiñeiro 1

title: (36315) - 1D Camiño e 14 Valadares

description: Park for those traveling with a quiet night, plenty of space to visit Valença, go shopping and eat a good cod. No service for children.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 20 N-554
description: rest area equipped with tables and a small beach for swimming, near the N554. Not suitable for spending the night, very inclined, without toilet services, litter bins, garbage containers, showers...

description: Large free parking, very well connected, quiet, safe and flat, without services but recommended to visit the city, is accessed by paved area between two-story house and large building although it is land is flat and there is no height or length limit

title: (36711) Tui - 5 Lugar Gayos
description: Bargaoil gas station, lovely Vanessa lets us throw gray ones in the black car washes in the toilets, leaving them clean as they were and get clean water, she also lets us sleep at the gas station

title: (4930) Valença - EM1046

title: (4960) Cousso -

title: (36691) Comboa - 25A Rua Comboa
description: Some places to park near the somatre river ... Beach bar and restaurants in the city 10 min. Good atmosphere

title: (36202) Vigo - 6 Rúa Cánovas del Castillo
description: Blue paid parking area, in front of the docks. Perfect for parking and taking a walk around the city. About 600 meters away is the Peitieiros bar where they make a daily menu with traditional and homemade dishes.

title: (36202) Vigo - 53 Avenida da Beiramar
description: It is a parking lot of a gas station. It is near the Center. You can go on foot.

title: (36202) Vigo - 24 Rúa de Jacinto Benavente
description: Little busy street with flat parking lots at night and a 15 minute walk to get to the Cies Islands ferry terminal. At night there were some people who were a bit insecure but the truth is that in the end without problems, well a truck entering the warehouses. Luckily we arrived at night because in the early morning everything was full

title: (4930) Cristêlo Côvo - IP1

title: (36955) Moaña - 323 Camiño á Costa do Latón
title_short: (36955) Moaña - 323 Camiño á Costa do Latón
description: Ground parking in front of the refreshment bar and the beach. There is no ban, but the site is next to a shipyard and the parking lot is a bit dirty.

title: (4960-507) Melgaço - 28 Rua de São Tiago
description: Market Park, free. Very good to visit the village of Melgaço. In front of the castle. Forbidden on market days Very flat pitches

title: (36202) Vigo - 61 Rúa de Jacinto Benavente

We have spent the night with a Camper van, very well, only noise from passing cars, since it is at the entrance of a polygon. There is a Repsol nearby and a Lidl a 4-minute walk away. If you come to Vigo, after several options in this app, this site seemed the best.

title: (4960) Melgaço - Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Quiet place to park and sleep. You can also park in the market parking, except market days (fifth feira)

title: (4930) - Ecopista
description: Large car park right next to the river and where you can start a cycle path by the ecopist. We stayed here one night and it happened to be a very quiet location as there was no traffic. There are trash cans near the park and recreation area. Clean toilets, there is a water point available, a bar, picnic tables, games for children, barbecues etc...

title: (36210) Vigo - 17 Rúa Ponte da Veiga
description: Parking in a quiet area with two supermarkets opposite lidle and Mercadona also has laundry in front. tables and fountain nearby in the park there is no toilet

title: (4960) Melgaço - 300 Avenida Salgueiro Maia
description: Borne euro-relais.

title: (36690) Sotomayor - 45 N-550
description: Self-service laundry

title: (36690) Soutomaior - N-550
description: Car park with service area for all waters. Park close by and small beach beyond. Also, beach has toilets. Shops 10 min walk away.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 8 Lugar Nores
description: Gas station with shower. Small but clean.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 30B Lugar Pazos
description: Perfect water source to recharge

title: (36826) - 18 Lugar Insua
description: Recreational area "Carreira Ancha". A very quiet place, with a picnic area and shade. Good views. Drinking water.

title: (36955) Moaña - 188 Estrada da Guia
description: Flat esplanade accessible by a dead end road, located in the upper part of an old quarry (be careful with children). Excellent views of the estuary. Playground glued. Supermarket and a couple of bars/restaurants about 200m. Beach with shower in the lower part of the quarry that goes down a small path that goes down the side of the quarry next to the houses. We have not slept but there is no indication that prohibits it and it looks like a quiet place.

title: (36690) Pontevedra - 3B Lugar Xunqueira
description: Beautiful site next to the river, dirt and asphalt parking, river beach showers, beach bar, public toilets (I think only open during the day).

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 1 Lugar Costal
description: Good place to stop or spend the night. Flat, with picnic tables, dumpster and store next to it.

name: Restaurante Luis
title: (36142) Restaurante Luis
description: We called this restaurant to see if we could park our motorhome. Upon arrival, the manager or owner was waiting for us with a place reserved for our 7.10mts. It is also a restaurant that is eaten by vice! Highly recommended. Call before you go.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 17 Rua Barciela
description: Place with free water, accessible from local road, not from autostrada. Not for sleep.

title: (36389) Gondomar - PO-340
description: Quiet viewpoint with good views. There is a fountain, tables to eat and garbage. We are not sure if you can sleep there but they have never told us anything (we have slept several times). There are horses sometimes. Usually no one is there at night. It is easy not to see it, so it is better to be careful and slow.

title: (36360) Nigrán - 4 Rua Torreiro
description: Parking area next to a road in which there is no type of traffic at night, very quiet area.

title: (36852) Fornelos de Montes - PO-9303
description: Picnic area with parking for two vans before the casariños waterfall ... in the shade ... ideal for eating.

title: (36208) Vigo - 498 Travesía de Bouzas Portuario
description: Parking area within walking distance of downtown Vigo. There are always free spaces. On Sunday mornings there is a fair and it is full of cars and vans.

title: (36212) Vigo - 101 Rúa San Paio
description: Large free parking area. You can stay overnight. Nearby, there are cafes, restaurants, pharmacies, banks, Amazon hub lockers, urban transport lines, etc.

title: (36208) Vigo - 55 Rúa de Eduardo Cabello
description: Parking lot next to a sports complex and a small beach. Central and calm. No opportunities for supply and disposal. Gas station 100 meters from the hotel.

title: (36713) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Flat area with good views, only accessible by dirt road

title: (36852) Fornelos de Montes - PO-9303
description: Rest area in the middle of nature, it is not paved small slopes, but a place with tranquility where you can wake up surrounded by horses or cows, a route begins from here and about 300 meters some large waterfalls with pools with the possibility of bathing without danger .

title: (36141) - 26A Rua Paredes
